newsitem.title: GERMANY: German shares close IBIS up, U.S. encourages.
newsitem.headline: German shares close IBIS up, U.S. encourages.

text.p: 1700 GMT - German shares close IBIS dealings firmer, off earlier lows after Wall Street opened slightly firmer and German bonds and dollar end day stronger.
* 30-share IBIS DAX ends up 6.68 points at 2,671.40, but bourse closes at four week low of 2,659.25.
* December DAX future contract up eight points at 2,683.5.
* Daimler leads volumes, rises over one percent.
* SAP down on ongoing worries on profit warning.
* VW up, after Merrill Lynch named the company as its Global Focus One stock.
